At the beginning of the context, Ganga dreams of becoming a Bollywood actress and runs away with her boyfriend, who promises her a film career under his aunt's tutelage.
After being sold by her boyfriend to Sheela's brothel, Ganga is forced into prostitution.
Ramnik, Ganga's older boyfriend, sells her to Sheela's brothel.
Sheela's brothel is where Ganga is forced into prostitution.
Nine years later, after Sheela's death, Ganga becomes the brothel's madame and is known as Gangubai.
When Shaukat assaults Gangu, she goes to Rahim Lala, the mafia leader, for justice. Impressed by her confidence, he refers to her as his sister.
Shaukat is a local goon who assaults Gangu violently, causing her to earn the adoration of fellow prostitutes and leading to Rahim brutally beating him when he reappears at the brothel.
As madame of Sheela's brothel, Gangu becomes a powerful figure in Kamathipura, the red-light district of Bombay.
Rashmibai requested Gangubai to persuade Madhu to become a sex worker, but Gangubai shared her story and sent her back.
Raziabai is the incumbent in the presidential elections of Kamathipura against Gangubai, who arranges illegal alcohol sales and advocates for the civil rights of prostitutes.
Kusum's daughter Roshni is a virgin in this context.
Afsaan, a Muslim tailor, gets married to Roshni with Gangubai's help and dowry payment.
After twelve years of absence, Madhu calls her family in this context to learn that her father has died and they have not forgiven her for running away.

Gangubai Kathiawadi had its premiere on 16 February 2022 at the Berlinale Speciale Gala Section of the 72nd Berlin International Film Festival.
The film was released in cinemas on 25 February 2022.
The film is now streaming on Netflix from 26 April 2022.
Gangubai Kathiawadi had its premiere on 16 February 2022 at the Berlinale Speciale Gala Section of the 72nd Berlin International Film Festival.
The film was released in cinemas on 25 February 2022.
The film is now streaming on Netflix from 26 April 2022.
All music in the film is composed by Sanjay Leela Bhansali.
All lyrics in the film are written by Chaitanya Prasad.
The film score is composed by brothers Sanchit Balhara and Ankit Balhara.
The film received critical acclaim with major praise directed towards the performances, music, production design, cinematography, storyline and Bhansali's direction.

edge: Collected ₹13.32 crore (US$1.6 million) on the second day.

node_2: domestic box office on the third day
edge: Collected ₹15.30 crore (US$1.8 million) on the third day,
Taking total domestic weekend collection to ₹39.12 crore (US$4.7 million).

Gangubai Kathiawadi's commercial performance has given the much-needed hope to the industry that the box-office in the near future would fire up even more. It is considered as an ice-breaker for Bollywood since it was the among few Hindi film to pull audiences back to the cinema halls after the pandemic.
As of 14 April 2022, the film grossed ₹209.25 crore (US$25 million) worldwide, becoming the fifth highest grossing Hindi films of 2022.
The film's box-office verdict of a 'hit'. The film grossed over ₹209.77 crore (US$25 million) worldwide, recovering its budget and emerging as a commercial success.
Without a male actor, she has managed to deliver a film that's all set to enter the ₹100 crore club and that speaks volumes.
